servers.name: Hytale Box
servers.description: Fully customized Spanish-speaking server with unique world, special progression, custom systems and active community.

servers.name: Hylanders
servers.description: Bridge between classic Minecraft and Hytale. Ultimate meeting point for block lovers and adventure seekers.

servers.name: DreamTale Vanilla
servers.description: Vanilla server with chill and experienced staff team. 5+ years experience providing quality gameplay.

servers.name: Hylife
servers.description: Medieval Low Fantasy Roleplay project focused on worldbuilding and long-term RP. Building foundation and seeking motivated collaborators.

servers.name: Mythlane
servers.description: Cozy RPG server with quests, dungeons, and collaborative building. Bilingual community (EN/FR).

servers.name: Hyzen
servers.description: Survival RPG server focused on stability, progression, and community. Regional realms (LATAM & Europe) with clear roadmap.

servers.name: Hoodexia
servers.description: Spanish Hytale server with Survival, PvE and PvP. Daily events, economy, clans, rewards, progression, 24/7 staff.

servers.name: Hyperion Online Anarchy
servers.description: Day 1 Hytale anarchy server with no rules and no resets. True vanilla anarchy experience.

servers.name: Hynetic
servers.description: Modern Hytale minigame network featuring SkyWars, SurvivalGames, and BedWars. Clean gameplay and fair mechanics.

servers.name: Horizons SMP
servers.description: Brand new Day-1 Hytale SMP (Jan 13th). Friendly, community-driven place to explore Hytale at launch.

servers.name: HytaleArgentum
servers.description: Argentine server with 0 ping advantage for local players. Focus on community and accessibility.

servers.name: Hylore
servers.description: Upcoming anarchy server for players who crave freedom and chaos. True anarchy with no rules, resets, or hand-holding.

servers.name: VoxelMC.de
servers.description: Classic minigames on Hytale: Bedwars, Skywars, KitPVP, BuildFFA, JumpOut and more with Hytale items.

servers.name: Mythale
servers.description: Spanish server focused on clans and community. Create a clan with friends and become a legend.

servers.name: Hytale Hispano
servers.description: Largest Spanish Hytale community server with fully polished survival world. Active Discord community.

servers.name: HytaleCorner
servers.description: Multi-mode server featuring minigames, factions-style gameplay, PvP and connected hubs for all player types.

servers.name: Arconi
servers.description: Next generation of Hytale servers. Reborn in 2026. Launching January 13th.

servers.name: 2B2H
servers.description: Hytale survival anarchy server with world that never resets. PvP enabled in free-for-all no rules environment.

servers.name: HytaleVanilla
servers.description: Growing launch community for upcoming Hytale server. Join others interested in playing together on day one.

servers.name: Hybase
servers.description: German-speaking Hytale server with motivated players building something great. PvP, minigames, and community-driven development.

servers.name: Hyfable
servers.description: Day 1 server network focused on building a long-term, stable home for Hytale players. Vanilla SMP, Skyblock, Mini-Games, and RPG progression.

servers.name: Hystralia
servers.description: Chill oceanic server. No cash shop, no P2W, no quality of life shop. PvE, PvP, Survival, RPG, no griefing.

servers.name: Hy;Chaos
servers.description: No rules Hytale Anarchy Servers. Do as you will. Vanilla and modded experiences available.

servers.name: HYTALE FACTIONS
servers.description: Faction-based server with pre-launch kit building. Join Discord to build connections early and prepare for release.

servers.name: HytaleSkull
servers.description: PvP-focused server built by experienced Minecraft developers. Competitive arenas, ranking system, and seasonal events.

servers.name: Peaceful Vanilla Club
servers.description: Survival vanilla server built for calm long-term PvE. No grief, no stealing, no base destruction. Vanilla vibes.

servers.name: PrimeTale
servers.description: Explore Hytale the way it was meant to be played. Focus on core gameplay: exploration, freedom, and authentic gameplay.

servers.name: Hyternity
servers.description: International MMO server with multiple worlds, hub system, and minigames. Global audience with scalable infrastructure.

servers.name: Rohak
servers.description: Community-focused server with custom maps, custom minigames, and stable infrastructure. Creator-friendly environment.

servers.name: Havenstale
servers.description: PvP-focused server with competitive arenas and ranking system. Prove your skills in 1v1 and team battles.

servers.name: Raidex
servers.description: Inspired by Escape From Tarkov. High risk PvPvE raids, economy, and community trading on Hytale.

servers.name: Dragonstone
servers.description: Day-one Exploration/Adventure server focused on core experience. No pay-to-win mechanics, community-driven.

servers.name: Aestheria
servers.description: French Hytale server with balanced gameplay and focus on community engagement. PvE, Survival, and PvP modes.

servers.name: Hytlands
servers.description: Community Hytale server combining exploration, building, and social gameplay. Day-1 ready infrastructure.

servers.name: MelonTale
servers.description: Day-1 launch server with minigames, survival, and creative modes. Casual-friendly community.

servers.name: Hytale South Africa
servers.description: African community server. Connecting players from South Africa and across the continent.

servers.name: HyTeller
servers.description: CityBuild server. Claim plots, build your dream city, and create your own adventure with community.

servers.name: Cacti Realm
servers.description: Launching January 13th. 25+ planned gamemodes including Survival, Creative, Prison, Adventure, and PvP.

servers.name: Bat Cove
servers.description: Survival and adventure server from experienced creators. Community-driven development and progression.

servers.name: Guilds
servers.description: Ultimate MMO server with guilds, player-driven economy, housing, custom classes, and PvP/PvE content.
